moves.title: Down Special (Spin Dash)
changes: Resource refreshes fixed on all ledge options

moves.title: Down Special (PSI Magnet)
changes: Canceling into magnet on the first frame of jump will now ground you much faster than later frames, similar to space animal shines

moves.title: Neutral Special (PK Flash)
changes: PK Flash hitbox now correctly appears the first frame after B is released instead of frame 15

moves.title: Down Special (Bomb)
changes: Bomb jump leniency matched to previous builds, as hurtbox fixes affected its behavior

moves.title: Side Special (Spin Maneuvers)
changes: Side B resource refreshes fixed on some ledge options

moves.title: Side Special (Egg Roll)
changes: Stall during aerial Egg Roll’s exit animation restored

changes.title: (R-alt) Bowser’s Castle Classic
changes: Correct version of the stage added to the build

moves.title: Characters and Gameplay
changes: Meteor canceling now functions properly again
Some throws which could previously be affected by holding down can no longer be
Freeze and other miscellaneous knockback effects now work as intended

moves.title: Costumes
changes: Wizard Ivy's shadow model adjusted to match vanilla costume
Peach's Fire/Dark up tilt graphics now work properly on Fountain of Dreams

moves.title: Other
changes: Proper SFX restored on Snake’s Win3 animation
Visibility of some models on Snake up tilt cleaned up
Ike, Mr. Game & Watch, and Knuckles target tests now load properly
Obtaining a Smash Ball while also having Double Cherry active will no longer crash the game
You can no longer back out of the Random Stage Selection screen with no stages enabled
Double Cherry is now disabled in events to prevent instability

moves.title: Other
changes: Port colors now only reset when pressing Z or when a controller is unplugged/disconnected
An additional Pokemon type is now allowed to spawn on Pokemon Stadium 2
Fox GuardOff animation behavior matched to the cast
Updated version number to v3.0.2 build-wide
